articles.title: Nigerian scientists announce discovery of Covid-19 vaccine - Face2Face Africa
articles.description: Scientists in Nigeria have discovered a vaccine for the deadly coronavirus which has infected over 20,000 people, killing 518 others in that country
articles.content:
Scientists in Nigeria have discovered a vaccine for the deadly coronavirus, which has infected over 20,000 people, killing 518 others in that country with 6,878 recoveries.
